item.title: Roblox: Tower Defense Simulator Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Tower Defense Simulator Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes In Tower Defense Simulator

There are many experiences in the tower defense genre, but Tower Defence Simulator stands out due to its atmosphere, well-designed maps, and interesting enemies. This article will be useful for Roblox players looking for freebies in this experience. Here they can find a complete list of Tower Defence Simulator codes and information about the rewards that they all offer.

Updated October 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Tower Defense Simulator currently offers a limited selection of active rewards. You can redeem in-game items that may help you progress or customize your gameplay. Codes are usually introduced during special events or updates, so new ones could appear at any time. Check back later to stay updated on future releases and additional rewards.

All Tower Defense Simulator Codes

Active Tower Defense Simulator Codes

  • NOTESLA? - Enter this code to claim a Crate. (NEW)

Expired Tower Defense Simulator Codes

  • 4BVisits - Enter this code to claim rewards.
  • EnterCodeHere - Enter this code to claim a Crate.
  • 1POINT7MIL - Enter this code to claim a Farm Tower Skin.
  • TDS5YEARS! - Enter this code to claim a 1 Party Skincrate.
  • MERRY2024 - Enter this code to claim Cookie Scout and 1 Holiday Crate.
  • IMCONSUMING - Enter this code to claim a Mid Grade Consumable Crate.
  • QNJOU11 - Enter this code to claim a Premium Crate.
  • HAPPYHALLOWEEN - Enter this code to claim a Halloween Skin Crate.
  • NAMETAGSRCOOL - Enter this code to claim a Name Tag.
  • JOHNRETURNS - Enter this code to claim the John Skin.
  • M3RRY2022TDS - Enter this code to claim a Cookie Scout.
  • beachglad2022 - Enter this code to claim Beach Gladiator skin.
  • MERRY2021 - Enter this code to claim Present Skin.
  • robloxisback - Enter this code to claim Premium Skincrate.
  • 1BILLION - Enter this code to claim Deluxe Crate.
  • COMMUNITY20 - Enter this code to claim Mini Skin.
  • celebration21 - Enter this code to claim 1 Party Crate.
  • 200KMAY - Enter this code to claim 500 Gems.
  • BLOXY21 - Enter this code to claim Commander Skin.
  • FIFTYK - Enter this code to claim 200 Coins.
  • delayed - Enter this code to claim a Premium Crate.
  • imababy - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • newyear2021 - Enter this code to claim 1 Premium Crate.
  • 30k - Enter this code to claim 1 Pumpkin Crate.
  • DOUBLEBLOXIES - Enter this code to claim Cowboy Skin.
  • ICYFREEZE - Enter this code to claim Freezer Skin.
  • W33KLICODE - Enter this code to claim +65 experience.
  • 5KMILESTONE - Enter this code to claim Minigunner Twitter Skin.
  • B1RDHUNT3R - Enter this code to claim Hunter Troop.
  • 1pumpkin - Enter this code to claim 1 Pumpkin Crate.
  • SPR1NGM1L3ST0NE - Enter this code to claim Springtime Skin.
  • HAPPY3AST3R! - Enter this code to claim Springtime Skin.
  • ELECTRO - Enter this code to claim 100 Coins.
  • SW33TXP - Enter this code to claim 100 XP.
  • 02MOMENT - Enter this code to claim XP.
  • MOARXP - Enter this code to claim XP.

How to Redeem Codes In Tower Defense Simulator

The process of redeeming codes in Tower Defence Simulator is quite similar to other Roblox games, so if players have previous experience, they shouldn't face any problems. For fans who are still confused about redeeming codes, there is a detailed guide below:

  • Launch Roblox: Tower Defence Simulator .
  • Press the button with the Twitter(X) icon located at the bottom of the screen.
  • Enter one of the above codes in the Enter Code Here field.
  • Click Redeem to receive the reward.

item.title: Animal Jam Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Animal Jam is a mobile game for children that can entertain them, as well as teach them something useful. Each player chooses and customizes an animal, explores the game world, communicates with other players, and participates in mini-games. In addition, in Animal Jam , you can learn more about each animal, see actual photos, and learn some interesting facts about them in the tips during downloads.

Many activities or customization items require in-game currency, and fortunately, you don't have to buy them with real money. Instead, you can redeem Animal Jam codes and get many Gems for free.

Updated October 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Animal Jam has several active rewards that give you Gems to spend on your adventures. These bonuses make it easier to customize your character, decorate your den, or explore new areas without grinding too much. It’s a good time to take advantage of the available offers and build up your resources. Be sure to check back soon in case more rewards are released.

All Animal Jam Codes

You can find active Animal Jam codes below.

How to Redeem Codes in Animal Jam

Codes in Animal Jam are redeemed similarly to other mobile games. However, you may encounter some difficulties because this is a game for kids and needs to be linked to a parental email. After verification, you can redeem Animal Jam codes. We will explain how in the guide below:

  • Launch Animal Jam and complete the tutorial.
  • Look in the top-right corner of the screen. Tap the gear button to go to the settings.
  • In the lower-left corner of the window, press Redeem Code.
  • Paste the code from the list of active codes into the field and press Continue.

How to Get More Animal Jam Codes

If you want to get the latest active codes for this great game for education, you can bookmark this page, as we update it regularly. Alternatively, you can visit the official developer web resources, where the latest codes are also posted:

  • Animal Jam Community in Discord
  • Animal Jam X page

Animal Jam is available on PC and mobile.

item.title: All Tapes of Terror Event Rewards in Black Ops 6 and Warzone
item.description:
Black Ops 6 and Warzone are reaching their final set of content drops for Season 6, giving players plenty to dive into before Black Ops 7 inevitably rolls out. From the debut of Zombie Royale in Warzone to a lineup of new weapons to unlock and grind camos for, this season has definitely gone out with a bang.

The Haunting in Season 6 has definitely brought in some killer content, along with plenty of free rewards through its various events. While many players are still grinding through the Battle Pass to unlock everything it has to offer, the Tapes of Terror Event is now making its debut, allowing players to earn even more rewards for free. Here is everything you need to know about the Tapes of Terror Event in Black Ops 6 and Warzone .

How Does the Tapes of Terror Event Work in Black Ops 6 & Warzone?

The Tapes of Terror Event is a collection-based event, similar to the Blaze of Glory and John Wick: Ballerina events from previous seasons. In this event, players need to collect Chucky and Jason Videotapes , which can be dropped from eliminations in Black Ops 6 Multiplayer and Zombies , or found within loot caches in Warzone .

Collected Videotapes can then be used to redeem rewards within the Tapes of Terror Event page in the main lobby. There are a total of eight rewards that players can redeem using these Videotapes, along with two additional Mastery Rewards for unlocking them all. One of these rewards is free, while the other is reserved for Season 6 BlackCell Pass owners.

All Tapes of Terror Event Rewards in Black Ops 6 & Warzone

Reward

How to Unlock

1 Hour Double XP Token

  • Redeem with 5 Videotapes

1 Hour Double Weapon XP Token

  • Redeem with 5 Videotapes

3x Wall to Wall Clearance GobbleGums

  • Redeem with 10 Videotapes

TBD (Emblem)

  • Redeem with 10 Videotapes

Flesh is Mine! (Calling Card)

  • Redeem with 15 Videotapes

Raithful Persuer (Loading Screen)

  • Redeem with 20 Videotapes

Get it Off! (Emote)

  • Redeem with 30 Videotapes

Scavvy (Alvarez Operator Skin)

  • Redeem with 40 Videotapes

Zombies Reel (Camo)

  • Unlock all Tapes of Terror Event Rewards

Zombies Reel BlackCell (Camo)

  • Purchase the Season 6 BlackCell Pass
  • Unlock all Tapes of Terror Event Rewards

When Does the Tapes of Terror Event End in Black Ops 6 & Warzone?

The Tapes of Terror Event officially begins on October 23 at 10 AM PT. While previous seasons have only run for about a week, the Tapes of Terror Event will actually run all the way up to the release date of Black Ops 7 , officially ending on November 14 at 10 AM PT alongside the Chucky Event Pass. Once the event ends, all of its rewards will be unobtainable for players who did not manage to unlock them during the event’s runtime.

item.title: Descenders Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Descenders is a fun bike racing game with great reviews. Here, you will find many locations to perform the most dangerous stunts, a bunch of activities, and a large selection of bikes and racing equipment. The bike physics is quite realistic, so performing stunts and just riding is a lot of pleasure. You'll have even more fun if you redeem Descenders codes to get a bunch of different bikes and customization items.

Updated October 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Descenders currently has a variety of rewards available through active codes. You can unlock themed shirts, bike items, helmets, pants, and special event gear to customize your rider and stand out during gameplay. The selection also includes holiday items, country-themed sets, and exclusive accessories. These rewards can help enhance both the look and experience of your gameplay. Be sure to revisit this guide regularly, as new rewards may be added in future updates.

All Descenders Codes

Working Descenders Codes

  • SPAM - Redeem to get Spamfish Shirt.
  • ADMIRALCREEP - Redeem to get the AdmiralBulldog Shirt.
  • DRAE - Redeem to get the Draegast Shirt.
  • YEAHTHEBOYS - Redeem to get the Jackhuddo Shirt.
  • SPEEDISKEY - Redeem to get the Jacksepticeye Shirt.
  • CUSTOM - Unlocked custom items.
  • MANFIST - Redeem to get the MANvsGAME Shirt.
  • NLSS - Redeem to get the NLSS Shirt.
  • SODAG - Redeem to get the Sodapoppin Shirt.
  • BUGGS - Redeem to get the Bay Area Buggs Shirt.
  • SOMETHINGRAD - Redeem to get the Something Rad Shirt.
  • SMILE - Redeem to get RockLeeSmile Shirt.
  • CIVRYAN - Redeem to get the CivRyan Shirt.
  • TOASTY - Redeem to get Toasty Ghost Shirt.
  • FUNHAUS - Redeem to get Funhaus Shirt.
  • TABOR - Redeem to get Sam Tabor Gaming Shirt.
  • WARCHILD - Redeem to get War Child Shorts and War Child Shirt.
  • FIREKITTEN - Redeem to get the Firekitten Shirt.
  • MERRYCHRISTMAS - Redeem to get the Arboreal Christmas Shirt, Enemy Christmas Shirt, Kinetic Christmas Shirt, and Descenders Christmas Shirt.
  • ICEFOXX - Redeem to get CashCow Bell item, Cashcow Shirt, Cashcow Bike item, Cashcow Pants, and CashCow Mask.
  • TEAMRAZER - Redeem to get #TeamRazer Shirt and #TeaRazer Shorts.
  • SPOOPY - Redeem to get the Skeleton Pants and Skeleton Shirt.
  • NATIONS - Redeem to get Goggles, Helmet, Pants, and Shirts themed for 17 countries.
  • SPE - Redeem to get Spe 2019 Bike, Goggles, Helmet, Pants, and Shirt.
  • DOGTORQUE - Redeem to get Dogtorque 2019 Bike, Goggles, Helmet, Pants, and Shirt.
  • KINGKRAUTZ - Redeem to get KingKrautz 2019 Bike, Goggles, Helmet, Pants, and Shirt.
  • HIGHVOLTAGE - Redeem to get High Voltage Goggles, Helmet, Pants, Shorts, and Shirt.
  • LOVE - Redeem to get the Heart.
  • SLASH - Redeem to get the Discord Bike.
  • PRIDE - Redeem to get 13 different Pride Flags.
  • STABLE - Redeem to get Training Set.

Expired Descenders Codes

There are currently no expired Descenders codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Descenders

Usually, it is more difficult to redeem codes in PC and console games than in mobile and Roblox games. Luckily, this is not the case with Descenders , where you can quickly find the redemption option in the game menu. However, if you still need help, we have created a guide on how to redeem codes in Descenders .

  • Launch Descenders and complete the tutorial.
  • In the game world, press Esc on your PC or the Options button on your gamepad.
  • Next, go to Extras.
  • Click Redeem Code.
  • In the grey box, paste the code from the list of working codes and press the command next to Confirm, depending on your device.

How to Get More Descenders Codes

It can often be difficult to find working codes in different PC and console games, so we recommend that you bookmark our guide in your browser. We update it regularly, so you won't miss out on any daily freebies. Of course, it also makes sense to check the social media of the Descenders developers for working codes.

  • Descenders Discord server
  • Descenders Facebook page
  • Descenders YouTube channel

Descenders is available on PC, Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo, and mobile devices.

item.title: How to Get Xerneas in Pokemon Legends Z-A (The One That Gives Quest)
item.description:
Xerneas is the Fairy-type boxart legendary introduced in Pokemon X and Y . Now, Pokemon Legends: Z-A doesn't have a lot of legendary Pokemon in its Pokedex to go out and catch, but Xerneas is indeed one of the few available (as well as its counter-legendary, Yveltal ).

The thing is, you cannot catch Xerneas in Pokemon Legends: Z-A until the post-game . Keep reading, and we'll show you the process for getting the special encounter.

Please do not keep reading if you do not want to be spoiled on stuff that happens after the credits roll.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A - How to Catch Xerneas

'The One That Gives'

Once you're in the post-game for Pokemon Legends: Z-A , you'll learn about the Infinite Z-A Royale. It basically just lets you fight trainers in Battle Zones at night like you've been doing for the whole game, but you can earn rewards from Quasartico and participate in Reward Matches there.

Go ahead and complete your first round of the Infinite Z-A Royale by earning 50,000 points and getting a Challenger's Ticket . Take it to Quasartico and speak to the male attendant at the desk to battle Zach the Driver. Once he's defeated, Lida will call you to head over to Hotel Z .

After the conversation, you will get two new Main Missions to follow ("The One That Gives" and "The One That Takes"). For now, we're going to show you how to complete the first quest, which will reward you with an encounter with Xerneas . To start the questline, speak to Mable at the Research Lab (next to Wild Zone 1).

Mable will ask you to go to Wild Zones 3, 5, and 9 , and find and defeat anomalous Alpha Pokemon (one at each location).

Finding the Alpha Pokemon in Wild Zones 3, 5, and 9

For the Alpha Pokemon in Wild Zone 3 (Rouge District), you should spot the angry Alpha Steelix right in the middle of the area. You can use Fighting, Ground, Fire, or Water-type moves to make quick work of it.

For the Alpha Pokemon in Wild Zone 5, just fast travel to the location, and you should spot a Gallade with red eyes walking in the middle of the area.

We managed to sneakily catch it with an Ultra Ball from the backside, but if you plan on battling it, try and use Fairy, Ghost, and Flying-type attacks.

And for the Alpha Pokemon in Wild Zone 9, you're going to want to find a Pangoro on the rooftops. To reach it, find one of the ladders in the northwestern corner of the Wild Zone, climb it, and then turn left and head straight to find Pangoro on a different roof.

If you look at our map pic above, the arrow is showing the path from the ladder to the Alpha Pokemon. You can also check out a video below showing how to find Pangoro.

Pangoro is weak to Fighting, Fairy, and Flying-type moves.

With the three Alpha Pokemon taken care of, you can head back to Mable at the Research Lab, and she'll give you a new objective: to head to Wild Zone 11 (this is where Xerneas is!) .

(You can find the location of Wild Zone 11 in our interactive map above for Pokemon Legends: Z-A ).

Battle With Xerneas

Fast travel to Wild Zone 11 (or a nearby location if you have not visited it yet) and interact with the objective marker by the river to start a cutscene (and then battle!) with the Legendary Kalos Pokemon. It's worth noting that you must capture Xerneas once you knock it out in order for the mission to progress.

So if you end up defeating it and then tossing a regular ol' Poke Ball, it will most likely evade capture, and then you need to restart the battle. There's no way to accidentally miss out on catching Xerneas, as the game will start the process over for you if your ball misses.

I would recommend just using an Ultra Ball, as it worked for me on the second attempt (I tried a Poke Ball first and it failed).

Xerneas is a Fairy-type Pokemon, making it susceptible to Poison and Steel-type moves. Make sure to heal up your party before facing it in battle, as it can cause some trouble if you're not careful.

48
4.6 /10

Pokemon Legends: Z-A
